What's New in DockFlow 1.35

Major New Features

  • Focus Filter Integration
    • Seamlessly integrate DockFlow with macOS Focus Filters.
    • Automatically apply your favorite presets when you switch Focus Modes.
    • For example, set a "Work" preset to activate when you enter your "Work" Focus, decluttering your Dock for maximum productivity.
  • Per-App Actions on Preset Apply
    • Introducing a powerful new way to automate your workflow: assign actions to specific apps within a preset.
    • The first available action is "Open App", which automatically launches the selected applications when the preset is applied.
    • This is just the beginning! Look forward to more actions in future updates, opening up a world of possibilities for automation.
